attributes.action: be proud of England and make april 23rd as its national day
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a very proud Englishman I want to see  an end to the discrimination of the english people.  Being proud to be English is a right not a crime. Vote and help to promote the right to be English and be proud in your own country. Whatever ethnicity you are if you were born in England you are english, so be proud of this fact.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
